content: /=All of the clansmen and fighters back away and whisper.=/
/=Folka turns and stares at you.=/

content.option: "I want to hear more. Let's get him in a cart."

content: [bolverk] "She'll get over it."
/=The roar of your rage brings your axes down fast, the air no longer hampering you. The blades bite deeply through the stonesinger's armor.=/
[bolverk] "They looked like some kind of dredge to me. So does this one."
[bolverk] "We'll put him in one of the carts. This better not bite me on the ass."
[bolverk] "We've killed plenty. Why help this one?"
/=You grunt and shout for everyone to follow you.=/
[bolverk] "You know one of these slags?"
/=She makes a dull noise, almost a hum. The stonesinger responds in kind.=/
[folka] "And where do you plan to heal him?"
[folka] "Another Valka making you do her bidding."
[folka bolverk] "He might be trying to get close to the cart. Trying to free the Sundr at the first chance."
[folka bolverk] "If you take that thing with us, we'll lose Ravens and clansmen as soon as we clear this cave. You know this."
[folka bolverk] "If you take that thing with us, we'll lose Ravens and clansmen as soon as we clear this cave. You know this."

content.option: "The Ravens can get over it. We're taking the dredge with us."

content: [folka bolverk] "She's talking to it. She's faen talking to it!"
[folka bolverk] "The Ravens are already questioning what they've signed up for without a dredge among us."
/=Folka looks angry but walks away instead of saying anything else.=/
/=Folka looks furious.=/
/=Folka pulls you aside and whispers.=/
[folka] "She's talking to it. She's faen talking to it!"
[folka] "This is a mistake. This isn't like you. We kill those things, not invite them into camp."
/=Zefr scowls and turns to the stonesinger one last time, murmuring a noise that is weakly returned.=/
/=Folka turns and stares at you.=/
/=Folka gasps and you find yourself growling, but Zefr ignores the response. =/
/=She glares at you as you pull out Claw and honor the stonesinger's last request.=/
{skip} mark1=bolverk mark2=zefr mark3=folka mark4=dredge_stonesinger_ally
/=The effort to get close enough is exhausting. You squeeze your axes in each fist.=/
/=The shieldmaiden walks off instead of saying anything else. Zefr looks at you.=/
/=You draw your axes. Zefr looks up and the air around you hardens. Each step is like walking under water. =/
/=You watch the Valka hum back and forth with the stonesinger for a moment before noticing the Ravens shaking their heads.=/
[zefr bolverk] "I know dredge have been the enemy for centuries, but this is bigger than the hatred of man, varl, and dredge."

content.option: "Bring him. Find out what he knows."

content: [zefr] "Bolverk, this is a mistake. We need information about the dredge and he can provide it."
[zefr] "Do not make this mistake, Bolverk! He is the only source of information we have on the dredge - why they are here, what those creatures were."
[zefr] "He implied he understands and asks for a quick death."
[zefr] "He is not attacking. He could have valuable information. He is in pain. The list goes on."
[zefr] "He is wounded and needs our help. All dredge are not the same."
[zefr] "He says 'Greetings' and that he...dreamed of you?"
[zefr] "He says they are...a nightmare. Then something about mercy and he thanks you."
[zefr] "I did not mean to weave around you."
[zefr] "I know quite a few."
[zefr] "I know the dredge have been your enemies for centuries, but this is bigger than the hatred of man, varl, and dredge."
[zefr] "I know the dredge have been the enemy for centuries, but this is bigger than the hatred of man, varl, and dredge."
[zefr] "In a cart on our way to Manaharr."
/=Zefr makes more noises and the dredge relaxes. She lifts him into a cart and he hums something before going quiet.=/
[zefr] "Monster."
[zefr] "Please. Don't."
/=Zefr thanks you again as the stonesinger is lifted into a cart. He hums something you cannot understand.=/
[zefr] "Thank you."
[zefr] "Their language is difficult for me, but I can learn more from him once he is healed."
[zefr] "Their language is still strange to me, but I believe he meant the tunnel ahead on the right will lead us outside."
/=The Valka again makes unfamiliar sounds like a skald trying to find the right tune and the stonesinger responds.=/
[zefr] "/=This one=/ is a...mender of sorts."
[zefr] "Those creatures were like nothing I've ever seen before."
